summary: This document is an email chain from December 2019 regarding NYPD checks, likely related to the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. It includes an attachment analyzing phone numbers from a contact list and Maxwell's calls, indicating coordination between the NYPD and FBI on child exploitation and human trafficking.

persons.name: Detective
persons.role: NYPD / FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force member
persons.context: The recipient of an email regarding NYPD checks, part of a joint task force investigating child exploitation and human trafficking.

events.title: Initial email regarding NYPD checks
events.description: An email was sent to a detective on the NYPD/FBI task force regarding NYPD checks.

events.title: Follow-up email with analysis attachment
events.description: A follow-up email was sent with an attachment analyzing common phone numbers from a contact list and Ghislaine Maxwell's calls.

keyFacts: The document shows ongoing investigative coordination between the NYPD and FBI on child exploitation and human trafficking in December 2019.
An attachment analyzes common phone numbers from a contact list and Ghislaine Maxwell's calls, suggesting a focus on her communications network.
The email chain indicates active investigative work related to the Epstein/Maxwell case nearly five months after Epstein's death.
